item.title: EC2 Instances
item.description: The Ultimate Guide to EC2 Instances In this guide we tackle 9 different EC2 topics, ranging from beginner to advanced, to provide you with the ultimate resource for long-term success. Feel free to skip around or dive right in at the start! Updated on Nov 28, 2018 The Basics of EC2 1. What is an EC2 instance? 2. EC2 Instance Pricing Options 3.
